thread.section_title: LegacyHeadstones.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LegacyHeadstones.com | legacyheadstones.com
thread.title: Ladeshia Daniels

author: Ladeshia Daniels
title: Ladeshia Daniels
text:
My eighteen year old son was murder in July and this was so hard to deal with , I was ordering a headstone instead of buying his first car or attending graduation. However, Legacy Headstone website was easy to use, the price was great, I haven't seen the headstone because I'm in another state, and I took my son back to my home state for his finally resting place. But, my sis said that it is beautiful, the picture was a spot on, that Legacy did a excellent job. I would like to thank you from the bottom of my heart and would recommend Legacy to anyone that is looking for a headstone!
Sincerely,
Ladeshia Daniels and family
